00034 using namespace Hypertable;
00035 namespace Logging = log4cpp;

00037 namespace {
00038 
00042   class  NoTimeLayout : public Logging::Layout {
00043   public:
00044     NoTimeLayout() { }
00045     virtual ~NoTimeLayout() { }
00046     virtual String format(const Logging::LoggingEvent& event) {
00047       return Hypertable::format("%s %s %s: %s\n",
00048           Logging::Priority::getPriorityName(event.priority).c_str(),
00049           event.categoryName.c_str(), event.ndc.c_str(),
00050           event.message.c_str());
00051     }
00052   };
00053 
00057   class FlushableAppender : public Logging::LayoutAppender {
00058   public:
00059     FlushableAppender(const String &name) : Logging::LayoutAppender(name) {}
00060     virtual ~FlushableAppender() {}
00061     virtual void flush() = 0;
00062 
00063     bool
00064     set_flush_per_log(bool choice) {
00065       bool old = m_flush_per_log;
00066       m_flush_per_log = choice;
00067       return old;
00068     }
00069 
00070   protected:
00071     bool m_flush_per_log;
00072   };
00073 
00077   class FlushableOstreamAppender : public FlushableAppender {
00078   public:
00079     FlushableOstreamAppender(const String& name, std::ostream &stream,
00080                              bool flush_per_log) :
00081                              FlushableAppender(name), m_stream(stream) {
00082       set_flush_per_log(flush_per_log);
00083     }
00084     virtual ~FlushableOstreamAppender() { close(); }
00085 
00086     virtual bool reopen() { return true; }
00087     virtual void close() { flush(); }
00088     virtual void flush() { m_stream.flush(); }
00089 
00090   protected:
00091     virtual void
00092     _append(const Logging::LoggingEvent& event) {
00093       m_stream << _getLayout().format(event);
00094 
00095       if (m_flush_per_log)
00096         m_stream.flush();
00097     }
00098 
00099   private:
00100     std::ostream &m_stream;
00101   };
00102 
00103   FlushableAppender *appender = 0;
00104 
00105 } // local namespace
00106 
00107 Logging::Category *Logger::logger = 0;
00108 bool Logger::show_line_numbers = true;
00109 
00110 void
00111 Logger::initialize(const String &name, int priority, bool flush_per_log,
00112                    std::ostream &out) {
00113   appender = new FlushableOstreamAppender("default", out, flush_per_log);
00114   Logging::Layout* layout = new Logging::BasicLayout();
00115   appender->setLayout(layout);
00116   logger = &(Logging::Category::getInstance(name));
00117   logger->addAppender(appender);
00118   logger->setAdditivity(false);
00119   logger->setPriority(priority);
00120 }
00121 
00122 void
00123 Logger::set_level(int priority) {
00124   logger->setPriority(priority);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void
00128 Logger::suppress_line_numbers() {
00129   Logger::show_line_numbers = false;
00130 }
00131 
00132 void
00133 Logger::set_test_mode(const String &name) {
00134   Logging::FileAppender *appender;
00135   Logger::show_line_numbers = false;
00136   logger->removeAllAppenders();
00137   appender = new Logging::FileAppender(name, 1);
00138   appender->setLayout(new NoTimeLayout());
00139   logger->setAppender(appender);
00140 }
00141 
00142 bool
00143 Logger::set_flush_per_log(bool choice) {
00144   return appender->set_flush_per_log(choice);
00145 }
00146 
00147 void
00148 Logger::flush() {
00149   appender->flush();
00150 }
